snippet: The economist Michelle Girard on why the jobless rate fell to 7.8 percent. | Start-ups get leaner and meaner -- and create fewer jobs.
abstract: The economist Michelle Girard on why the jobless rate fell to 7.8 percent. | Start-ups get leaner and meaner -- and create fewer jobs.

headline.main: Business Day Live: Jobless Rate Falls to 7.8%, Lowest Since January 2009
